html.p: At the end of this sequence, and after some practice, you should be able to:

li.p: Determine the rank and nullity of a linear transformation [mathjaxinline]T: \mathbb R^ n \rightarrow \mathbb R^ m[/mathjaxinline], given its standard matrix
Find bases for the image and kernel of a linear transformation [mathjaxinline]T: \mathbb R^ n \rightarrow \mathbb R^ m[/mathjaxinline], given its standard matrix

html.p: For time budgeting purposes, this sequence has 2 videos totaling 12 minutes, plus some questions.
